summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 FOREST RIVER WILDWOOD RV. THE CONTACT STATED THAT HE ATTEMPTED TO EXIT THE VEHICLE BUT THE DOOR WOULD NOT OPEN. THE CONTACT STATED THAT HE HAD SOMEONE OPEN THE DOOR FROM THE OUTSIDE AND THE DOOR OPENED WITHOUT HESITATION. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO THE DEALER FOR INSPECTION. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURE WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 5,000.

TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 FOREST RIVER WILDWOOD.  THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR THE DOMETIC REFRIGERATOR.  HE STATED THAT THE REMEDY TO REPAIR THE ISSUE WAS NOT SATISFACTORY BECAUSE IT STATED THAT A HEAT SHIELD WOULD BE PLACED OVER THE TUBING, WHICH WOULD ONLY CONTAIN THE FIRE.  THE REMEDY WOULD NOT PREVENT A FIRE.  THE CONTACT IS IN THE PROCESS OF TAKING THE VEHICLE TO BE REPAIRED.  THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT REPLACING THE HEAT SHIELD WOULD BE THE ONLY THING THEY WOULD COVER.  ANY ADDITIONAL FAILURES WOULD NOT BE COVERED UNDER THE RECALL.  THE VIN AND FAILURE MILEAGE WERE UNKNOWN.

OWN A DOMETIC REFRIGERATOR IN MY RV. AT THE TIME THE BOILER CRACKED, MY REFRIGERATOR WAS NOT INCLUDED IN RECALL, NOW THAT IT IS INCLUDED, DOMETIC WILL NOT FIX IT BECAUSE MY WARRANTY IS OUT. THE RECALL LETTER DOES NOT STATE ANY INFORMATION ABOUT HAVING A WARRANTY AT THIS TIME ON THE PRODUCT, IT IS THERE DEFECT, NOT MY PROBLEM IF IT TOOK THEM SO LONG TO FIGURE IT OUT. THE POINT IS MY BOILER CRACKED AND LEAK WHICH COULD HAVE CAUSED A POTENTIAL FIRE, NOW SINCE MY WARRANTY IS UP ON MY REFRIGERATOR DOMETIC WILL NOT FIX IT EVEN THOUGH IT IS LISTED IN THE RECALL. I AM NOT SATISFIED WITH THIS ISSUE. WILL HAVE TO LOOK IN TO TAKING FURTHER ACTION IT THEY CAN NOT RESOLVE THIS.  *TR
